entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot build ASP.NET Core 7 app for Raspberry Pi 4 #46306
  • When session and cookie timeout call to Azure B2C authorize endpoint fails with CORS error. #46305
  • source-building .NET 7 fails when building npmprojects #46304

Closed

  • Web Finger (RFC7033) middleware #45143
    Discussions
  • Azure B2C logout endpoint does not redirect to the post_logout_redirect_uri when logout performed in YARP middleware #46104

PullRequests

Updated

  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    Perf, area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    blocked, area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add schema support infrastructure #46300
    area-identity
  • Changing reflection-base json configuration to PostConfigure #46303
